name: NSPasteboardWriting
desc: A set of methods that defines the interface for retrieving a representation of an object that can be written to a pasteboard.

items.name: func writableTypes(for: NSPasteboard) -> [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType]
items.desc: Returns an array of UTI strings of data types the receiver can write to a given pasteboard.

items.name: func writingOptions(forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType, pasteboard: NSPasteboard) -> NSPasteboard.WritingOptions
items.desc: Returns options for writing data of a specified type to a given pasteboard.

items.name: struct NSPasteboard.WritingOptions
items.desc: Type to specify options for writing to a pasteboard.

items.name: func pasteboardPropertyList(forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns a property list object to represent the receiver on a pasteboard as an object of a specified type.

items.name: struct NSPasteboard.WritingOptions
items.desc: Type to specify options for writing to a pasteboard.
